DataElement.preferredName: Adverse Event Current Cycle Occurrence Yes No Pending Coded Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric code to signify whether an adverse event occurred during the current cycle of therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the experience or occurrence of an adverse event or related event._Occurring in or belonging to the present time._An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An unwanted effect caused by a drug or therapy.  Such effects can be drug related, dose related, route related, patient related, caused by an interaction with another drug, or caused by opioid initiation or dose escalation.

Concepts.definition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).

ObjectClass.changeDescription: Change concept code to C41331 as C2861 is retired per EVS. dw

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Yes or No or Pending response to a question coded as 1 (Yes) or 2 (No) 4 (Pending).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.

Concepts.definition: Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support NCI caAERS integration with Rave 6.2014 D.Reeves
